meanings.sent1: She always outgambles her friends in poker.
meanings.sent2: He outgambles everyone at the casino with his lucky streak.
meanings.sent3: The cat outgambles the dog in a game of cards.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition outgambles the odds every time.
meanings.sent5: Outgambles like a pro to win big.

meanings.definition: To surpass in a game of chance.
meanings.sent1: The magician outgambles the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: Luck outgambles skill in this game of chance.
meanings.sent3: The coin flip outgambles the dice roll.
meanings.sent4: Her guess outgambles the random selection.
meanings.sent5: Outgambles the odds to hit the jackpot.
